Name: Beauty Paradise
About the game: Welcome to the Blue Ocean Resort, an idyllic paradise on the beach within Paradise Cove. You find yourself at your grandmother Umi's beach resort. Looking forward to a great summer where they can finally put the past to rest and reconnect with this side of the family. But there is a catch When you find that your plans to relax are ruined as your grandmother is ill and she asks if you can help fill in for her whilst she recovers. Now your time here will be filled with work at this beachside resort instead of play. Still there is an upside The resort is filled with a whole host of beautiful female staff to work alongside. Features Female Protagonist Huge Array of Decisions, each affecting the stories events Multiple different endings to uncover Secrets to unlock and explore Huge variety of locations and characters Large cast of characters and romances
